title: Population Ecology
text:
Preface
This book will serve as a digital compendium in ØKO2002 Population eecology at Nord University. The course is part of the bachelor education in nature management, and the students are (mostly) taking the course in their third study semester. It is not intended to replace the text book we are using in the course (see Leganto for the reading list), but rather to supplement it. There is, however, one main part that is not well covered in the text book and for which this digital compendium will be the main source. This is chapter XX - Applied Popluation Ecology.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

title: 5  Applied population ecology
text:
Here, I will add text and figures about applied population ecology. This include harvest models, PVA and MPA, and a short snipet about IUCN red listing.






Does it work in books!



Just testing if this also works nicely with Quarto books (as it does with web pages)
